attributes.action: Remove automatic broadcasting of signing on TV programmes for deaf people and provide this facility through interactive buttons on the remote control.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not being able to remove the person signing in the bottom right hand portion of the screen, becomes extremely annoying to the majority of the general public that do not require this facility.  It would therefore make sense to have the facility available only by pressing one of the interactive buttons on the remote control (say the blue button for example).  Sub-titles are available on 888 so I don't see why we should be subject to progammes with automatic siging.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
